meanings.definition: The state of being incomplete or unfinished.
meanings.sent1: The incompleteness of the puzzle frustrated her.
meanings.sent2: The incompleteness of his homework caused him to stay up late.
meanings.sent3: The cake's incompleteness without frosting made it look funny.
meanings.sent4: The incompleteness of the story left the readers wanting more.
meanings.sent5: The incompleteness of the painting left a sense of mystery.

meanings.sent1: She felt the incompleteness of her collection of stamps.
meanings.sent2: The incompleteness of the project made it hard to present.
meanings.sent3: The incompleteness of the joke left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The incompleteness of the plan led to confusion.
meanings.sent5: The incompleteness of the map caused them to get lost.
